definition: Guangxi province in south China/since 1959, Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], location of the Zhuang ethnic group, abbr. 桂[Gui4], capital Nanning 南寧|南宁[Nan2 ning2]

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".
sentences.chinese: 广西北部湾经济区在泛北经济合作中具有战略地位。

sentences.english: The routine proceeding organ of Guangxi Lawyers Association is the chairmen's meeting.
sentences.chinese: 广西律师协会日常的议事机构是会长办公会。

sentences.english: Which company Guangxi jade forest has can installation outside sunshade shed?
sentences.chinese: 广西玉林有哪些公司可以安装室外遮阳棚？

sentences.english: Opening ceremony of the 2011 Summer Camp at the Guangxi - Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 在南宁市的广西人民大会堂举行开营仪式。

sentences.english: Major earthquakes in Guangxi occur in the areas where there is great difference between neotectonic movement.
sentences.chinese: 广西的地震主要发生在新构造差异运动较强的区域。

sentences.english: This study is on wood anatomy of 14 species of Camellia sect Chrysan-tha from Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 本文对采自广西的14种金花茶木材进行解剖研究。

sentences.english: Where eight steps of Guangxi He Zhou City area has ceiling material sell?
sentences.chinese: 广西贺州市八步区哪里有天花板材料卖？

sentences.english: Guangxi native Ye Yaliang manages a bamboo forest that produces large, sweet bamboo shoots.
sentences.chinese: 阿亮是广西人，他的竹林里生长的是大头甜笋。

sentences.english: The Hepu Tombs, from the Han Dynasty, are in Guangxi province.
sentences.chinese: 汉代的合浦陵园在广西省境内。

sentences.english: The third case is an 18-year-old male from Beiliu City, Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 第三例是一名来自广西省北流市的18岁男子。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 阳朔坐落于广西省东北部，在桂林的东南面。

sentences.english: Camellia terminalis, a new ornamental plant from Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 项生金花茶，广西一新的观赏植物。

sentences.english: The six big policy measures for further development and perfecting guangxi village share cooperation system.
sentences.chinese: 进一步发展完善广西农村股份合作制的六大政策措施。

sentences.english: This article introduces the conceptual planning of Dongxing City in Guangxi Region.
sentences.chinese: 该文介绍了广西壮族自治区东兴市的概念规划。

sentences.english: The vernacular bamboo construction techniques are attributed to migrants from rural Guanxi.
sentences.chinese: 乡土风格的竹结构建造技术是移植于广西的乡村。

sentences.english: In Guangxi, Isoptera are widespread, and 133 species are nominated.
sentences.chinese: 广西地区等翅目昆虫采到并定名的种类已有133种。
